typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_KEY as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE as date,
		WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_CITY as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_STATE as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_ZIP as string,
		ZIP_CODE5 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION as string,
		CHANGE_CODE as string,
		COUNTRY_CODE as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_STAT as string,
		PERSON_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERADDR_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT SOURCE_KEY,WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,WS_EXT_PH_NAME,LAST_NAME,\nCASE WHEN CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME) > 0 THEN trim(SUBSTRING(FIRST_NAME,1,CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME))) ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME,\nCASE WHEN CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME) > 0 THEN trim(SUBSTRING(FIRST_NAME,CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME),LEN(FIRST_NAME))) ELSE NULL END AS MIDDLE_NAME,\nWS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,WS_EXT_PH_CITY,WS_EXT_PH_STATE,WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,ZIP_CODE5,WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,CHANGE_CODE,\nCOUNTRY_CODE,WS_EXT_PH_STAT,PERSON_CHECK_SUM,PERADDR_CHECK_SUM,PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM\nFROM (\nSELECT A.SOURCE_KEY,A.WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_NAME) WS_EXT_PH_NAME, \nCASE WHEN A.ws_ext_ph_name like \'%,%\' THEN UPPER(trim(SUBSTRING(A.ws_ext_ph_name,1,(CHARINDEX(\',\',A.ws_ext_ph_name)-1))))\nELSE UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_NAME) END AS LAST_NAME,\nCASE WHEN A.ws_ext_ph_name like \'%,%\' THEN UPPER(trim(SUBSTRING(A.ws_ext_ph_name,CHARINDEX(\',\',A.ws_ext_ph_name)+1,LEN(A.ws_ext_ph_name)))) \nELSE NULL END AS FIRST_NAME,\nCAST(A.WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE as date) as WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1) WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2) WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3) WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,\nUPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_CITY) WS_EXT_PH_CITY,CASE WHEN UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE)=\'US\' THEN NULL ELSE UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE) END WS_EXT_PH_STATE ,\nA.WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,SUBSTRING(A.WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,1,5) ZIP_CODE5,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION) WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,UPPER(A.CHANGE_CODE) CHANGE_CODE,UPPER(B.COUNTRY_CODE) COUNTRY_CODE,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STAT) WS_EXT_PH_STAT,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_NAME,\'1\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,\'2\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,\'3\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,\'4\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,\'5\')+\nISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,\'6\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_CITY,\'7\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STATE,\'8\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,\'9\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STAT,\'10\')    ),2) PERSON_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,\'4\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,\'5\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,\'6\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_CITY,\'7\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STATE,\'8\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,\'9\')),2) PERADDR_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,\'2\')),2) PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM\nFROM CMDM_STAGE.RS_OMNI_VIPS_DAILY_PART_HEADER_DELTA_STG A LEFT JOIN \nCMDM_STAGE.STATE_MASTER B ON UPPER(TRIM(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE)) = UPPER(TRIM(B.STATE_CODE))\n) T',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source(output(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TgtPerson
source(output(
		SOURCE_KEY as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_NAME as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE as date,
		WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_CITY as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_STATE as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_ZIP as string,
		ZIP_CODE5 as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION as string,
		CHANGE_CODE as string,
		COUNTRY_CODE as string,
		WS_EXT_PH_STAT as string,
		PERSON_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERADDR_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT SOURCE_KEY,WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,WS_EXT_PH_NAME,LAST_NAME,\nCASE WHEN CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME) > 0 THEN trim(SUBSTRING(FIRST_NAME,1,CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME))) ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME,\nCASE WHEN CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME) > 0 THEN trim(SUBSTRING(FIRST_NAME,CHARINDEX(\' \',FIRST_NAME),LEN(FIRST_NAME))) ELSE NULL END AS MIDDLE_NAME,\nWS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,WS_EXT_PH_CITY,WS_EXT_PH_STATE,WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,ZIP_CODE5,WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,CHANGE_CODE,\nCOUNTRY_CODE,WS_EXT_PH_STAT,PERSON_CHECK_SUM,PERADDR_CHECK_SUM,PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM\nFROM (\nSELECT A.SOURCE_KEY,A.WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_NAME) WS_EXT_PH_NAME, \nCASE WHEN A.ws_ext_ph_name like \'%,%\' THEN UPPER(trim(SUBSTRING(A.ws_ext_ph_name,1,(CHARINDEX(\',\',A.ws_ext_ph_name)-1))))\nELSE UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_NAME) END AS LAST_NAME,\nCASE WHEN A.ws_ext_ph_name like \'%,%\' THEN UPPER(trim(SUBSTRING(A.ws_ext_ph_name,CHARINDEX(\',\',A.ws_ext_ph_name)+1,LEN(A.ws_ext_ph_name)))) \nELSE NULL END AS FIRST_NAME,\nCAST(A.WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE as date) as WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1) WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2) WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3) WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,\nUPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_CITY) WS_EXT_PH_CITY,CASE WHEN UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE)=\'US\' THEN NULL ELSE UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE) END WS_EXT_PH_STATE ,\nA.WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,SUBSTRING(A.WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,1,5) ZIP_CODE5,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION) WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,UPPER(A.CHANGE_CODE) CHANGE_CODE,UPPER(B.COUNTRY_CODE) COUNTRY_CODE,UPPER(A.WS_EXT_PH_STAT) WS_EXT_PH_STAT,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_NAME,\'1\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,\'2\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,\'3\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,\'4\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,\'5\')+\nISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,\'6\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_CITY,\'7\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STATE,\'8\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,\'9\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STAT,\'10\')    ),2) PERSON_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,\'4\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,\'5\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,\'6\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_CITY,\'7\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_STATE,\'8\')+ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,\'9\')),2) PERADDR_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,\'2\')),2) PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM\nFROM CMDM_STAGE.RS_OMNI_VIPS_DAILY_PART_HEADER_DELTA_STG A LEFT JOIN \nCMDM_STAGE.STATE_MASTER B ON UPPER(TRIM(A.WS_EXT_PH_STATE)) = UPPER(TRIM(B.STATE_CODE))\n) T',
	format: 'query') ~> source3
source(output(
		prefix as string,
		FullName as string,
		firstName as string,
		middleName as string,
		lastName as string,
		suffix as string,
		gender as string,
		birthdate as date,
		birthPlace as string,
		srcPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		SSN as string,
		ITIN as string,
		driverLicense as string,
		primaryEmail as string,
		primeryPhone as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		primaryAddrLine1 as string,
		primaryAddrLine2 as string,
		primaryAddrLine3 as string,
		primaryAddrCity as string,
		primaryAddrState as string,
		primaryAddrPostalCode as string,
		countryCD as string,
		countyName as string,
		PostalCode5 as string,
		SourceDeletedInd as string,
		SourceStatus as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM CMDM_STAGE.PERSON where sourceSystem=\'OMNI 7.1\'',
	format: 'query') ~> source4
SourceDeleteInd derive(SourceCreateDateTime = currentTimestamp(),
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime = currentTimestamp(),
		row_status = 'I',
		Batchid = 1,
		Lastupdatetime = currentTimestamp()) ~> derivedColumn1
exists11 derive(SourceDeletedInd = case(CHANGE_CODE=='DELETE', 'Y','N')) ~> SourceDeleteInd
derivedColumn10 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insert
filter1, TgtPerson exists(derivedColumn7@Row_Status == TgtPerson@row_status
	&& SOURCE_KEY == srcPkey
	&& WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION == sourceSystem,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Doesntexists1
derivedColumn7 filter(CHANGE_CODE=='NEW') ~> filter1
exists9 derive(Row_Status = 'I',
		SrcDInd = 'N',
		LastUpdatedTime = currentTimestamp()) ~> derivedColumn6
derivedColumn6 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> Inactive
source4 aggregate(Mini_Batch_Id = min(batch_id)) ~> aggregate1
aggregate1, TgtPerson join(Mini_Batch_Id == batch_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join2
source1 derive(Row_Status = 'A') ~> derivedColumn7
filter1, TgtPerson exists(SOURCE_KEY == srcPkey
	&& WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION == sourceSystem
	&& derivedColumn7@Row_Status == TgtPerson@row_status,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists4
exists8 derive(Row_Status = 'A',
		SourceDeletedInd = 'N',
		Batch_Id = 1,
		Createtime = currentTimestamp(),
		CreatedBy = 'OMNI',
		LastUpdate = currentTimestamp()) ~> derivedColumn8
derivedColumn8 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> alterRow1
derivedColumn11 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> Update
derivedColumn13 filter(CHANGE_CODE=='UPDATE') ~> filter2
filter3, TgtPerson exists(PERSON_CHECK_SUM == check_sum,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists6
derivedColumn1 filter(CHANGE_CODE=='NEW') ~> filter3
filter3 derive(row_status = 'A',
		CreatedBY = 'OMNI') ~> derivedColumn10
exists6 derive(row_status = 'I') ~> derivedColumn11
source3 derive(Row_Status = 'A',
		BatchId = 2) ~> derivedColumn13
filter2, TgtPerson exists(SOURCE_KEY == srcPkey
	&& WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION == sourceSystem
	&& derivedColumn13@Row_Status == TgtPerson@row_status,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists7
exists10 derive(Lastupdatetime = currentTimestamp(),
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime = currentTimestamp(),
		CreatedBY = 'OMNI',
		Batchid = 2,
		SrcInd = 'N') ~> derivedColumn14
filter2, TgtPerson exists(SOURCE_KEY == srcPkey
	&& WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION == sourceSystem
	&& derivedColumn13@Row_Status == TgtPerson@row_status,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DoesntExist1
derivedColumn14 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> alterRow2
join2, filter2 join(srcPkey == SOURCE_KEY,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join3
join3 derive(RowStatus = 'I') ~> derivedColumn15
derivedColumn15 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> alterRow3
exists4, TgtPerson exists(PERSON_CHECK_SUM == check_sum,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists8
DoesntExist1, TgtPerson exists(PERSON_CHECK_SUM == check_sum,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists9
exists7, TgtPerson exists(PERSON_CHECK_SUM == check_sum,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists10
Doesntexists1, TgtPerson exists(PERSON_CHECK_SUM == check_sum,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists11
Insert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FullName = WS_EXT_PH_NAME,
		firstName = FIRST_NAME,
		middleName = MIDDLE_NAME,
		lastName = LAST_NAME,
		birthdate = WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,
		srcPkey = SOURCE_KEY,
		sourceSystem = WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,
		SSN = WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,
		primaryAddrLine1 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,
		primaryAddrLine2 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,
		primaryAddrLine3 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,
		primaryAddrCity = WS_EXT_PH_CITY,
		primaryAddrState = WS_EXT_PH_STATE,
		primaryAddrPostalCode = WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,
		countryCD = COUNTRY_CODE,
		PostalCode5 = ZIP_CODE5,
		SourceDeletedInd,
		SourceStatus = WS_EXT_PH_STAT,
		row_status = derivedColumn10@row_status,
		batch_id = Batchid,
		check_sum = PERSON_CHECK_SUM,
		lastUpdateDateTime = Lastupdatetime,
		SourceCreateDateTime,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime,
		createDateTime = Lastupdatetime,
		createdBy = CreatedBY,
		lastUpdatedBy = CreatedBY
	)) ~> PersonInsert
alterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FullName = WS_EXT_PH_NAME,
		firstName = FIRST_NAME,
		middleName = MIDDLE_NAME,
		lastName = LAST_NAME,
		birthdate = WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,
		srcPkey = SOURCE_KEY,
		sourceSystem = WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,
		SSN = WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,
		primaryAddrLine1 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,
		primaryAddrLine2 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,
		primaryAddrLine3 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,
		primaryAddrCity = WS_EXT_PH_CITY,
		primaryAddrState = WS_EXT_PH_STATE,
		primaryAddrPostalCode = WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,
		countryCD = COUNTRY_CODE,
		PostalCode5 = ZIP_CODE5,
		SourceDeletedInd,
		SourceStatus = WS_EXT_PH_STAT,
		row_status = Row_Status,
		batch_id = Batch_Id,
		check_sum = PERSON_CHECK_SUM,
		createDateTime = Createtime,
		createdBy = CreatedBy,
		lastUpdateDateTime = LastUpdate,
		lastUpdatedBy = CreatedBy,
		SourceCreateDateTime = LastUpdate,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime = Createtime
	)) ~> sink1
Update sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['srcPkey','batch_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FullName = WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,
		firstName = FIRST_NAME,
		middleName = MIDDLE_NAME,
		lastName = LAST_NAME,
		birthdate = WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,
		srcPkey = SOURCE_KEY,
		sourceSystem = WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,
		SSN = WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,
		primaryAddrLine1 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,
		primaryAddrLine2 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,
		primaryAddrLine3 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,
		primaryAddrCity = WS_EXT_PH_CITY,
		primaryAddrState = WS_EXT_PH_STATE,
		primaryAddrPostalCode = WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,
		countryCD = COUNTRY_CODE,
		PostalCode5 = ZIP_CODE5,
		SourceDeletedInd,
		SourceStatus = WS_EXT_PH_STAT,
		row_status = derivedColumn11@row_status,
		batch_id = Batchid,
		check_sum = PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM,
		createDateTime = SourceCreateDateTime,
		lastUpdateDateTime = Lastupdatetime,
		SourceCreateDateTime,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime
	)) ~> sink2
alterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FullName = WS_EXT_PH_NAME,
		firstName = FIRST_NAME,
		middleName = MIDDLE_NAME,
		lastName = LAST_NAME,
		birthdate = WS_EXT_PH_BRTH_DATE,
		srcPkey = SOURCE_KEY,
		sourceSystem = WS_EXT_PH_OMNI_VERSION,
		SSN = WS_EXT_PH_PART_NUM,
		primaryAddrLine1 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L1,
		primaryAddrLine2 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L2,
		primaryAddrLine3 = WS_EXT_PH_ADDR_L3,
		primaryAddrCity = WS_EXT_PH_CITY,
		primaryAddrState = WS_EXT_PH_STATE,
		primaryAddrPostalCode = WS_EXT_PH_ZIP,
		countryCD = COUNTRY_CODE,
		PostalCode5 = ZIP_CODE5,
		SourceDeletedInd = SrcInd,
		SourceStatus = WS_EXT_PH_STAT,
		row_status = Row_Status,
		batch_id = derivedColumn13@BatchId,
		check_sum = PERSON_CHECK_SUM,
		createDateTime = SourceLastUpdateDateTime,
		createdBy = CreatedBY,
		lastUpdateDateTime = Lastupdatetime,
		lastUpdatedBy = CreatedBY,
		SourceCreateDateTime = SourceLastUpdateDateTime,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime
	)) ~> sink3
alterRow3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['srcPkey','batch_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		FullName,
		firstName,
		lastName,
		birthdate,
		srcPkey,
		sourceSystem,
		SSN,
		primaryAddrLine1,
		primaryAddrLine2,
		primaryAddrLine3,
		primaryAddrCity,
		primaryAddrState,
		primaryAddrPostalCode,
		countryCD,
		PostalCode5,
		SourceDeletedInd,
		SourceStatus,
		batch_id,
		check_sum,
		createDateTime,
		createdBy,
		lastUpdateDateTime,
		SourceCreateDateTime,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime,
		row_status = RowStatus
	)) ~> sink4
